New Records: Luka Modric scored the winning goal for Croatia against Poland in the UEFA Nations League
Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored the decisive goal in the 54th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Croatia had strong home form with only one loss in their last seven matches
Poland had key players like Nicola Zalewski and Robert Lewandowski in their squad
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia held on for an important victory after losing their Nations League opener 2-1 to Portugal
Both teams now have three points from their first two matches, aiming to qualify for the UNL play-offs
